member.name: M:RSecurityBackend.Controllers.AppUserControllerBase.Get(RSecurityBackend.Models.Generic.PagingParameterModel,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Paginated Users Information (if user does not have user:view permission list only contains him/her information)

member.name: M:RSecurityBackend.Controllers.AppUserControllerBase.Get(System.Guid)
member.summary: returns user information (if user does not have user:view permission trying to view other users' information fails with a forbidden error)

member.name: M:RSecurityBackend.Controllers.AppUserControllerBase.Post(RSecurityBackend.Models.Auth.ViewModels.RegisterRAppUser)
member.summary: add a new user (if you are trying to add an admin user you yourself should be admin)
member.returns: id/generated password if required could be retrieved from return value

member.name: M:RSecurityBackend.Controllers.AppUserControllerBase.Put(System.Guid,RSecurityBackend.Models.Auth.ViewModels.RegisterRAppUser)
member.summary: update existing user (if you are trying to update an admin user you yourself should be admin) (if user does not have user:modify permission trying to modify other users' information fails with a forbidden error)
member.param: existingUserInfo.id could be passed empty and it is ignored completely, if password is sent empty it does not has effect

member.name: M:RSecurityBackend.Controllers.AppUserControllerBase.Delete(System.Guid)
member.summary: delete user (only admin users can delete other admin users, a user cannot delete himself/herself)

member.summary: start user self delete process (send a verification email to user)

member.summary: View User Sessions (user needs user:sessions permission to view other users sessions)

member.summary: Set User Image (via FormData, specifying userId as 'id' in formData ) - if Files.count is 0 image would be removed - (users need user:modify to change other users image)
